programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Welcome to Greenleaf, a picture-perfect Indiana town where the high school is the proud focus of attention. On the night of the Oscars telecast, the town's center of attention is Greenleaf teacher Howard Brackett when a former student, who's now a winning actor, tells the audience of millions that Howard is gay. Kevin Kline plays stunned Howard, who scrambles to go forth with his wedding to devoted Emily (Joan Cusack) and assert his manliness.

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons.(n)

programme.title: Crossing Over
programme.desc: The politically charged subject of illegal immigration forms the basis of this drama starring Harrison Ford as a morally conflicted border official in love with a Mexican woman about to be deported, whose job connects him to several other aspiring citizens struggling to make their way in the U.S. Ray Liotta and Ashley Judd costar.(n)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).(n)

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Welcome to Greenleaf, a picture-perfect Indiana town where the high school is the proud focus of attention. On the night of the Oscars telecast, the town's center of attention is Greenleaf teacher Howard Brackett when a former student, who's now a winning actor, tells the audience of millions that Howard is gay. Kevin Kline plays stunned Howard, who scrambles to go forth with his wedding to devoted Emily (Joan Cusack) and assert his manliness.(n)

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught.(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible.(n)

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Avenge the Crows: The Legend of Loca
programme.desc: The pendulum of revenge is set in motion when an assassin named Joker is released from prison. His orders from the Reyes Ricos prison gang are to take down Loca, an ex-gang member who once ran the powerful Los Grajos crew. Now Loca makes her living pushing drugs, and maintains a watchful eye on her young cousin, Cammy, the only family she has left. Although she is cunning and street smart, Loca doesn't see Joker coming, and he attacks Cammy to lure her out of hiding.(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).(n)

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: The More the Merrier
programme.desc: An eccentric older man, who sublets half of a very small apartment in wartime Washington from a young "government girl," plays Cupid after finding out she is single and tries matching her up with a handsome Air Force sergeant by persuading him to move in, too. Charles Coburn won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as the matchmaker, and the film was nominated for Best Picture.

programme.title: Walk, Don't Run
programme.desc: Three English-speakers forced to share a cramped apartment during the housing shortage of the 1964 Tokyo Olympics find themselves involved in a wacky series of high jinks and romantic misunderstandings. Cary Grant's final film role.

programme.title: The Sea Hawk
programme.desc: Frank Lloyd ("Mutiny on the Bounty") directed this sweeping silent version of Sabatini's classic swashbuckler. Oliver Tressilian: Milton Sills. Rosamund: Enid Bennett. Lionel Tressilian: Lloyd Hughes. Peter Godolphin: Wallace MacDonald.

programme.title: Le Petit Soldat
programme.desc: Jean-Luc Godard's study of terrorism and torture in the Algerian War. Michel Subor, Anna Karina. Jacques: Henri-Jacques Huet. Also known as “Little Soldier.

programme.title: Gambling Lady
programme.desc: A straight-shooting professional poker player meets her match when she places her bets against a suave playboy from the upper crust.

programme.title: The Woman in Red
programme.desc: Murder in the social set, involving a penniless horsewoman and an equally destitute blue blood.

programme.title: East Side, West Side
programme.desc: Soap opera examines love and infidelity among New York City's upper crust, where a charming society woman discovers her serial philanderer of a husband is fooling around yet again, this time with a model.

programme.title: These Wilder Years
programme.desc: A tycoon tries to find his 20-year-old illegitimate son.

programme.title: Clash by Night
programme.desc: A woman grows torn between her husband and his friend, a local movie projectionist. Despite entertaining thoughts of leaving her husband, she is dissuaded by her knowledge of his volatile temper.

programme.title: Night Nurse
programme.desc: A nurse in the care of some children discovers that the tykes are the targets of a murder plot, and puts herself in danger to save them from the terrible fate.

programme.title: Ever in My Heart
programme.desc: The German-born husband of an American woman suffers prejudice in their small hometown during World War I , bringing their marriage under terrible strain.

programme.title: Lady of Burlesque
programme.desc: A comedian and a dancer team up to solve a mystery, when a mad killer plagues the old opera house they work at with his harrowing antics.

programme.title: The Mad Miss Manton
programme.desc: A socialite stumbles upon a dead body and alerts the police but they think she is playing a practical joke. After a newspaper editor takes her to task in print, she sues him for libel and enlists the aid of her society friends in tracking down the body and finding the killer.

programme.title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway hit about an imperious, acid-tongued lecturer who, after being injured in a fall in front of an Ohio family's abode, becomes their surprise houseguest while he recovers, and proceeds to drive them crazy.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about an Army officer on trial for murder and claiming temporary insanity caused him to kill the man responsible for a brutal attack on his wife.

programme.title: Some Came Running
programme.desc: An embittered World War II veteran, whose writing career has stalled, returns to his serene hometown with an easy woman in tow.

programme.title: The Front Page
programme.desc: A Chicago newspaper editor gets his soon-to-be-married star reporter to cover one last story involving the politically motivated execution of a convicted cop killer.

programme.title: Primary
programme.desc: This landmark cinema vérité documentary by Robert Drew follows John F. Kennedy for nearly a week in April 1960 as he campaigns across Wisconsin to take on Hubert Humphrey during the presidential primary race.

programme.title: Cass Timberlane
programme.desc: Social barriers interfere with the happiness of a small-town Minnesota judge and his bride after she becomes disenchanted with his country-club cronies and their haughty wives and an attempt to find solace in amateur theater leads to an illicit romance.

programme.title: The Judge Steps Out
programme.desc: A Bostonian judge gets bored with his life and takes off to become a short order cook at a diner, soon falling in love with the owner. But soon, he must choose between his new life and his old one.

programme.title: What Price Hollywood?
programme.desc: A star-struck waitress manages to make a good impression on a prominent film director, and with the help of the alcoholic filmmaker she quickly rises to stardom as "America's Pal.

programme.title: Night Waitress
programme.desc: An ex-con working at a waterfront dive in San Francisco unwittingly gets caught up in a murder and a plot to steal a mysterious cargo shipment.

programme.title: The Case of the Curious Bride
programme.desc: A woman who thought herself a widow is blackmailed by her first husband in this Perry Mason whodunit. Look fast for Errol Flynn in his first Hollywood film.

programme.title: Blonde Fever
programme.desc: A middle-aged husband (Philip Dorn) falls for a golden-haired waitress (Gloria Grahame). Mary Astor, Marshall Thompson. Johnny: Felix Bressart. Brillon: Curt Bois. Directed by Richard Whorf.

programme.title: Of Human Bondage
programme.desc: Story of a disabled and introverted medical student's relationship with a crass waitress. Based on the novel of W. Somerset Maugham.

programme.title: They Drive by Night
programme.desc: Two driven brothers who own a trucking business deal with crooked distributors and unscrupulous rivals while establishing their transport company, and one battles through a crippling injury and the other is victimized by a mentally unstable woman.

programme.title: The Music Man
programme.desc: Oh, they have trouble, right there in River City, Iowa, where a smooth-talking con man convinces the locals to fork up the dough to pay for musical instruments so they can form a marching band and keep the youngsters of the town out of mischief. He must also convince a local librarian, who may have realized that he has no idea how to play or teach music. Robert Preston reprises the title role, for which he won a 1957 Tony.(n)

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Americana tunefest set against the backdrop of the impending 1904 World's Fair in St. Louis, as a family learn their father's business is transferring him to New York City, and his four daughters argue that they don't want to move. Songs include "The Boy Next Door," "The Trolley Song" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas.(n)

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: The study of a megalomaniacal TV personality (Andy Griffith in his film debut), whose guitar and folksy humor take him from an Arkansas jail to national popularity. The movie offers a satire of television, pop culture and the public fascination with celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
programme.desc: Paul Newman and Elizabeth Taylor sizzle together in this Oscar-nominated Best Picture that adapts Tennessee Williams' Pulitzer-winning play about a smoldering wife (Taylor) who watches her bitter young husband (Newman) turn to the bottle. Newman, Taylor and director Richard Brooks also were nominated. Remade in 1976 and 1984.(n)

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Best Picture is based on Robert Penn Warren's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel about the rise and fall of a Southern politician who starts out as an honest corruption fighter only to degenerate into a ruthless, unethical demagogue. Broderick Crawford won a Best Actor Oscar as the office holder and Mercedes McCambridge got the nod as Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of his shrewd secretary. Remade in 2006 with Sean Penn as the venal politico.(n)

programme.title: Merton of the Movies

programme.title: Lovely to Look At
programme.desc: An American inherits a Parisian dress salon from his late aunt, and ventures to France with his two best friends on a mission to convince the other owners to sell their half in order to finance a Broadway show. When the three Americans discover that the salon is all but broke, they pool their resources and wits to make the establishment a winning proposition.(n)

programme.title: Seeing Red
programme.desc: Red Skelton plays multiple roles in this short film about a man who puts a curse on his boss after losing his job. Includes an appearance by vaudeville legend A. Robins, aka the Banana Man.(n)

programme.title: Ship Ahoy
programme.desc: Innocently delivering a weapon to spies, a dancer (Eleanor Powell) meets a children's writer (Red Skelton) on a boat to Puerto Rico. Bert Lahr, Virginia O'Brien, Tommy Dorsey orchestra with Frank Sinatra. Good dancing. Edward Buzzell directed.(n)

programme.title: The Yellow Cab Man
programme.desc: An accident-prone inventor gets a job as cab driver, and a sleazy lawyer plots to steal his invention for "elastic glass.(n)

programme.title: A Southern Yankee
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a bumbling Northern bellhop becomes an undercover operative working behind Southern lines, where he poses as a Confederate spy. Many of the film's gags were devised by silent-film legend Buster Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Three Little Words
programme.desc: The story of songsmiths Bert Kalmar and Harry Ruby, and their stratospheric rise to fame.(n)

programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio. (cc).

programme.title: Love Potion No. 9
programme.desc: Two nerdy scientists become irresistible after drinking a palm reader's secret formula. (cc).

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: While traveling to California with her boyfriend, a pregnant teen is abandoned at an Oklahoma Wal-Mart. She decides to stay, and makes a temporary home in the store while pondering her future. (cc).

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested. (cc).

programme.title: Once upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A corrupt CIA agent teams up with a guitar-playing gunslinger to stop a coup South of the Border. (cc).

programme.title: Fast and Furious

Speeding from the streets of L.A. into the Mexican desert in convoy heists and precision tunnel crawls, Dom and Brian attempt to get their man while exploring thrilling new frontiers in the fine art of racing. (cc).

programme.title: The Beach
programme.desc: An American vacationer and a French couple find danger on a secluded island paradise off the coast of Thailand. (cc).

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).

programme.title: Courage Under Fire
programme.desc: “Rashomon”-like flashbacks lend depth to this military drama, which centers on a scrupulous Army officer (Denzel Washington) probing the Gulf War death of a chopper pilot (Meg Ryan). Monfriez: Lou Diamond Phillips. Hershberg: Michael Moriarty. Ilario: Matt Damon. Bruno: Bronson Pinchot. Edward Zwick directed. (cc).

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: A precocious, preoccupied 15-year-old develops a crush on a teacher and befriends an eccentric tycoon who falls in love with the same woman. Soon, the prep-schooler and the millionaire do battle in an escalating war of dangerous pranks. (cc).

programme.title: Bananas
programme.desc: A neurotic New Yorker follows the woman he loves unrequitedly to a Central American country and becomes embroiled in a revolution, eventually becoming leader of the country. (cc).

programme.title: Taps

programme.title: Mr. 3000
programme.desc: An arrogant baseball player leaves the game the moment he collects his 3000th hit, but, years later, when a statistical snafu is discovered and his total is lowered, the over-the-hill slugger must come out of retirement to reach the milestone and cement his place in baseball history. (cc).

programme.title: Weekend at Bernie's
programme.desc: A boss invites two underlings to his beach house with the intention of having them killed because they uncovered his illegal activities. However, when they arrive and discover the boss himself is dead, the pair spends the weekend pretending he's alive so that they can enjoy the place and figure out how to get themselves out of harm's way. (cc).

programme.title: Why Him?

programme.title: Assassin's Creed

programme.title: Hulk

programme.desc: Dla tych, którzy twierdzą, że w telewizjach muzycznych i radiach pojawia się za mało polskiej muzyki, Eska TV proponuje program "Polska noc". To całonocne pasmo zarezerwowane jest dla krajowych wykonawców.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Mistrzowskie Szybkie strzały
programme.desc: Specjalne, mundialowe wydanie programu "Szybkie strzały". Twórcy przeprowadzają nietypową sondę uliczną. Prowadzący zadają napotkanym osobom oryginalne, często wręcz abstrakcyjne pytania. Nieraz potrafią nimi swoich rozmówców mocno zaskoczyć.

programme.title: Mistrzowskie Szybkie strzały
programme.desc: Specjalne, mundialowe wydanie programu "Szybkie strzały". Twórcy przeprowadzają nietypową sondę uliczną. Prowadzący zadają napotkanym osobom oryginalne, często wręcz abstrakcyjne pytania. Nieraz potrafią nimi swoich rozmówców mocno zaskoczyć.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.
